    description

    *This 2015 Chevrolet Silverado... Features include: 4.3L Engine, Tow Package, Traction Control and Side Airbags. May include Lease or Finance Incentives. Price includes: $1,500 - General Motors Consumer Cash Program. Exp. 03/31, $1,000 - Chevrolet National Purchase Bonus Cash. Exp. 03/31

    reviews
    • December 15, 2013
    • price2724
    • Olyphant, PA

    I had an amazing experience dealing with Motorworld Toyota. The process was seamless from start to finish. From talking with Laura via email and phone to talking with Jay Thomas on the phone the night before, he assured me that he would get me into the car that I wanted, and he did just that. As soon as I arrived at the dealership, I was greeted by Adrian, who was very friendly and took me to Jay to discuss the cars I would be interested in. I can't say enough good things about Adrian, I will recommend everyone who is looking to buy a Toyota to her. She made my car buying process feel very laid back and not rushed at all. She didn't pressure me to make a decision immediately and was not put off if I wanted to test drive more than one car to be sure. I never had such a laid back car buying experience. Both Jay and Adrian made the whole process fun, and seamless.

    Read full review on DealerRater
